bike.description: High performance carbon fiber composite with high modulus fibers, Dyad Plus lay-up, tri-oval shaped top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters, 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube, PressFit 30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, twin seat stays, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Jamis Xenith Comp level, full carbon composite, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, carbon dropouts with stainless axle interfaces
Mavic CXP-22 rims with CNC sidewalls, 28/32H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g black stainless steel spokes
Shimano 105 RD-5700 rear and 105 FD-5700 braze-on front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
FSA Gossamer compact double with Press Fit 30, 50/34T, 170mm (48/51), 172.5mm (54/56), 175mm (58/61)
Jamis carbon fiber micro-adjust, 31.6 x 300mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco SPID Arrowhead with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
